member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UIActionInterpreter
member.summary: Executes a test action in a user interface (UI) test, interprets the results, and writes to a log.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UIActionInterpreter.#ctor(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UITestInterpreter)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the given interpreter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UIActionInterpreter.Cancel
member.summary: Called when the Cancel Playback button is clicked by the user.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UIActionInterpreter.CurrentBrowser
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that contains the name and version of the current browser.
member.returns: The name and version of the current browser.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UIActionInterpreter.DelayBetweenActions
member.summary: Gets or sets the time to delay before executing each action.
member.returns: The number of seconds between executions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UIActionInterpreter.Dispose
member.summary: Releases resources.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UIActionInterpreter.InRetryMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the interpreter is in retry mode.
member.returns: true if the interpreter is in retry mode; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.summary: Executes the provided action by using the given map and logs the result by using your implementation of a custom invoker.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UIActionInterpreter.SearchTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of seconds before a search process times out.
member.returns: The number of seconds before time-out.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UIActionInterpreter.ThinkTimeMultiplier
member.summary: Gets or sets the multiplier to use for think time values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UIActionInterpreter.TopLevelWindowSinglePassSearch
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether single pass search will be used for top level windows.
member.returns: true to use single pass search; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UIActionInterpreter.WaitForThinkTime(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.Common.UITestAction)
member.summary: Waits for an appropriate amount of think time before the provided action is invoked.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UITestInterpreter
member.summary: Executes each test action in a user interface (UI) test and interprets the results of each action by using the value of the property.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UITestInterpreter.#ctor(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.Common.UITest)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UITestInterpreter.ActionInvoker
member.summary: Gets or sets the to interpret this test.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UITestInterpreter.Cancel
member.summary: Cancels the interpretation of the current step or test.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UITestInterpreter.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Optionally releases resources.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UITestInterpreter.ExecuteAction(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.Common.UITestAction,Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.Common.UIMap.UIMap)
member.summary: Executes the given action. The action contains an ID for the UIObject on which it acts. This ID is used to get a queryid for the object and this is passed to the invoke method of the input action object. The Invoke method also requires an object of the UITestActionInvoker interface type. In this case the default is the UITestPlayback type that implements the UITestActionInvoker.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UITestInterpreter.ExecuteTest(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.Common.UITest)
member.summary: Executes the given test.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UITestInterpreter.ExecuteTest(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.Common.UITest,System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Executes the given test for the specified range of actions.
member.param: The identifier for the starting action. Provides a negative number to start at the beginning of the list.
The identifier for the ending action. Provides a negative number to execute to the last action in the list.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UITestInterpreter.HighlightElement
member.summary: Highlights the UI element that is associated with the current action.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UITestInterpreter.IsExpectedExceptionFromActionExecution(System.Exception)
member.summary: Returns true if the given exception is expected from the execution of an action.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UITestInterpreter.LogActionExecutionException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Logs SQM Data for Playback Exception.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UITestInterpreter.OnErrorHandledByUser(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.Common.UITestErrorEventArgs)
member.summary: Called after user handles the action execution error. This can be used to trace log something.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UITestInterpreter.RaiseWaitForThinkTimeEvent(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.Common.UITestAction,System.Int32)
member.summary: Raises the event.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITest.CodeGeneration.UITestInterpreter.Unhighlight
member.summary: Removes highlighting from the UI element that is associated with the current action.
